items.name: Progenesis
explicitMods: When Hit during effect, 25% of Life loss from Damage taken occurs over 4 seconds instead

Feasting and drinking of the milk of the mother,
they fought to the death for every last drop.

A swig will chill your heart,
A glass will still your soul.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Reserves mana to apply a buff and leave afterimages of your recent past. Cast the spell again to return to the oldest afterimage, teleporting to that location as well as resetting your Life, Mana and Energy Shield to the values they had then.
explicitMods: Buff grants 5% increased Cooldown Recovery Rate
This Spell's Cast Speed cannot be modified
Buff makes you Unaffected by Temporal Chains

socketedItems.secDescrText: Places a Sigil on the ground, which grants a buff to you and allies in the area around it for a duration. The Sigil gains stages as you spend mana in its area, making the buff more powerful. You can only have one Sigil of Power at a time.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Grants a buff giving more poison damage and a chance to inflict poison.
